item.description:
Hope everybody had a fun, relaxing summer.

Yikes, last quarter of 2012. How are you doing, attracting what you want? Hopefully, going well. If still distracted & unfocused, perhaps it’s because deep down, you’re still not clear what you want to attract.

The first step to Manifesting what you desire is to see yourself as already there - seeing, feeling, & having that desired Outcome.

So, if unclear, what if you’re able to ask some key questions that would ensure more clarity of the outcome you desire?

Tom Maloney, BostonLOA member & Essential Mind Power Trainer, will share how we can use an NLP**-based questionnaire powerfully to springboard us to develop a more well formed outcome.

A Well Formed Outcome allows you to ...
- align your core beliefs with your true desires
- know your own value & what you really care about
- have a strong sense of motivation & purpose
- create a solid plan for success &
- propels inspired action

Join us, make the decision to wrap up the year in a BIG way, modeling the way many successful people think & manifest their outcomes.

***************************************************
About Tom Maloney:
www.climbingthesuccessladder.com
contact: 781-760-4593

Tom began his personal journey to success in his teens, when he first studied creative meditation for goal achievement with the Silva Method. Since that time he has, through numerous disciplines, added to his tool kit while assisting others along their path to achieving their dreams. His passion for studies in the field of personal development led him to the achievement of his own personal dream, teaching and empowering others through the Essential Mind Power Program.
A Master Practitioner of NLP and a Certified NLP Coach, Tom has dedicated his life to building viable futures from the inside out.

About NLP** & LoA:
NLP (NeuroLinguistic Programming) is the science of studying success, & then "reprogramming" the software of your mind to produce immediate & positive change in all areas of your life. Combining the thinking of LOA (Law Of Attraction) with NLP skills offers you powerful & practical tools for changing limiting beliefs, behaviors, & for achieving rapid results in your personal, professional & spiritual development

***************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Well Formed Outcome: the Attractor Factor
